caption.p: Phylogenetic tree of all the 2019-nCov sequences available on February 9, 2020 ( n = 74, cartooned outbreak clade), plus n = 1 Bat CoV-like sequence, n = 5 Human SARS, n = 4 Bat SARS-like sequences, and n = 2 from MERS. Numbers along the branches represent a bootstrap value >0.90. The scale bar represents expected substitutions per nucleotide site.
